author: Doug Bandow
title: We Could Sue Beijing, But Careful America What You Wish For
description: The U.S. could be become a tasty target for feasting lawyers around the globe. The post We Could Sue Beijing, But Careful America What You Wish For appeared first on The American Conservative.
content: The U.S. could be become a tasty target for feasting lawyers around the globe.America possesses a devastating weapon more fearsome than nukes: lawyers. Attorneys are lining up to sue the Peoples Republic of China for having mishandled the COVID-19 virus and m… [+9655 chars]
